segments.text: I'm sorry I'm so late . I had a really bad day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's ten after six.We ' re late.But dinner is at six thirty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I know . I'm really sorry . I lost my bag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll call the lost and found office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't think of it.Thank you.And I do apologize for being late .
segments.speaker: S1
